name: Introduction to Anthropology
description: An overview of the field of Anthropology, with an emphasis on the history, different branches, and current research.

name: Foundations of Economic Anthropology
description: An introduction to the field of Economic Anthropology, including the historical basis, key concepts, and theories.

name: Applied Economic Anthropology
description: A study of the application of Economic Anthropology to problems in the real world, with a focus on case studies and examples.

name: Advanced Economic Anthropology
description: An in-depth exploration of Economic Anthropology theories and concepts, with a focus on contemporary debates and new research.
